thread.section_title: Gullwing Motor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gullwing Motor | gullwingmotor.com
thread.title: Charles LeMaitre
thread.title_full: Gullwing Motor reviewed by Charles LeMaitre

author: Charles LeMaitre
title: Charles LeMaitre
text: Having recently sold two important vehicles to Gullwing Motor Cars, I am pleased to be able to state that all aspects of the transactions were handled in a highly professional manner. Payments were made promptly,questions were answered knowledgeably and intelligently. Debbie was wonderful to work with. Peter who,obviously, "sets the pace" so to speak has reason to be proud of the company he has founded and the "team" he has organized. At this writing, I would give Gullwing Motor Cars a rating of five plus!
